episodes.title: S4E7: Denver - Joshua Sykes Cult
episodes.description: We've got an old timey cult this time! Joshua Sykes was gathering followers in California before settling in Denver, where he claimed doomsday was around the corner. Public outcry and legal trouble made sure he stayed in the newspapers. Classic cult shit! Stay smart - stay safe - stay spooky! Tell us your spooky Colorado stories at 2girlswhoscareeasily@gmail.com , and follow us on instagram, TikTok, and Youtube ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠@2girlswhoscareeasily⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ Resources: https://denverite.com/2016/12/14/joshua-sykes-colorado-cult/ https://www.jehovahs-witness.com/topic/6253014909190144/unraveling-threads-which-expose-watchtower https://www.newspapers.com/article/the-san-francisco-examiner-cult-prophet/66793142/ https://chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn84031081/1921-02-15/ed-1/seq-5/#date1=1856&index=5&date2=1929&words=Joshua+Sykes&searchType=basic&sequence=0&state=&rows=20&proxtext=joshua+sykes&y=10&x=11&dateFilterType=yearRange&page=1 https://chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn89053283/1921-03-15/ed-1/seq-7/#date1=1856&index=6&date2=1929&words=Joshua+Sykes&searchType=basic&sequence=0&state=&rows=20&proxtext=joshua+sykes&y=10&x=11&dateFilterType=yearRange&page=1 https://chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn85059715/1916-07-25/ed-1/seq-5/#date1=1856&index=12&date2=1929&words=Joshua+Sykes&searchType=basic&sequence=0&sort=date&state=&rows=20&proxtext=joshua+sykes&y=10&x=11&dateFilterType=yearRange&page=3 chrome-extension://efaidnbmnnnibpcajpcglclefindmkaj/https://berkhistory.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/2018_spring_newsletter.pdf The daily telegram.
